authors.author: Fanny J. Crosby John R. Sweney

verse.name: c1
verse.lines: O the height and depth of mercy! newline O the length and breadth of love! newline O the fullness of redemption, newline Pledge of endless life above!

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: Take the world but give me Jesus. newline All its joys are but a name; newline But His love abideth ever, newline Through eternal years the same.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: Take the world but give me Jesus. newline Sweetest comfort of my soul; newline With my Savior watching o'er me, newline I can sing though billows roll.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: Take the world but give me Jesus. newline Let me view His constant smile; newline Then throughout my pilgrim journey newline Light will cheer me all the while.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: Take the world but give me Jesus. newline In His cross my trust shall be, newline Till with clearer brighter vision, newline Face to face my Lord I see.
